features: SILICONE DRYING MAT & BABY BOTTLE PREP. Simplify your feeding routine with a 2-in-1 drying and bottle prep mat that lets you organize, dry, and prep bottles and accessories for feeding baby.
BUILT-IN BOTTLE PREP CUP. Easily prep your baby’s bottle with a convenient cupped bottle holder that allows you to assemble most baby bottles and training cups with one hand.
SUCTION BASE. A practical suction base keeps the mat securely in place.
RIDGED SILICONE SURFACE. Ridges in the mat promote drainage and aeration to help ensure that bottles and other accessories dry quickly.
BUILT-IN BOTTLE BRUSH STANDS. Store your baby bottle brushes in convenient stands that are designed into both corners of the mat.
REMOVABLE DRYING PEGS. Removable polypropylene drying pegs let you customize your setup and hold bottles and parts upright while they drain and dry.
FUN DESIGN. The cute rainbow design adds a colorful pop to your countertop.
DISHWASHER SAFE. The durable silicone mat is dishwasher (top rack) safe and BPA-free.
body.description: Simplify your feeding routine with a 2-in-1 drying and bottle prep mat that lets you organize, dry, and prep bottles and accessories for feeding baby. The silicone drying mat includes multiple features that allow you to effortlessly dry and prep baby’s bottle. The ridged surface ensures that bottles and other accessories dry quickly, while the removable drying pegs hold bottles, parts, pacifiers, and cups upright while they drain. There are even two spots to store your bottle brushes! When the bottle is dry, simply nestle it into the built-in holder for prep that only requires one hand. The suction base keeps the mat in place while you prep. Silicone mat is dishwasher safe (top rack) for easy cleaning. BPA-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, great quality silicone drying mat
reviews.reviewText: I got this Dr. Brown’s 2-in-1 Dry & Prep Silicone Mat, Silicone Baby Bottle Drying Mat with Removable Pegs for Baby Essentials, Built-in Bottle Prep, BPA-Free to dry and hold my nephews bottles and sons cups. This mat seems to be heavy duty and a good quality. There is a suction cup on the bottom to help hold it in place. I have mine by our kitchen sink, it’s easy accessible and keeps everything for preparing a bottle at hand. The ridges on the mat help with drainage and quick drying. The colorful ridges add a pop of cute colors. The pegs can be removed or put on either side of the mat, it stays in place on the mat well. There’s a small indent in the silicone mat to push the pegs into to hold them in place. There are two openings to hold bottle brushes and a cup in the middle to help hold a bottle upright for preparation. It can easily be hand washed or thrown in the dishwasher. Overall it’s a great drying mat that works as intended and it’s cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another great product from Dr Brown’s
reviews.reviewText: When my son was little we used Dr Brown’s products and appreciated their quality. More recently, our family has been more focused on recycling. In order to recycle, most items need to be rinsed out and air dried. While it is easy to rinse things, finding a way to get empty water/pop/juice bottles to remain standing while turned upside down to drain and dry is not. I kept remembering the baby bottle drain/dry stations I had seen back in the day when our son was much younger and thought that might work well. That is when I came across this bottle drying/prep mat from Dr Brown’s. The pegs originally designed to hold baby bottles while draining also work equally well for bottles draining and drying out for recycling. The center cavity will be nicely repurposed for bottle lids, and the rest of the mat will allow for draining/drying of other to-be-recycled containers. The entire items is well made from a heavier weight silicon, and will wash up easily in the dishwasher. Recommend - for multiple purposes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heavy, sturdy silicone mat
reviews.reviewText: We use Dr Brown's bottles for my grandson, so when I saw this item I wanted to give it a try. The mat itself is heavier than I expected - definitely sturdy silicone. I like that the brush holder feature is removable and that all parts are dishwasher safe. The green inserts (that go in the bottle) as well as the bottle fit great on the pegs. My one complaint is that I don't think the middle part which is supposed to hold the bottle for you for one-handed preparation is that great. The bottle fits into it, but doesn't sit flat on the bottom, so it tilts a bit. I also don't love the rainbow color - would have preferred something in neutral tones for my kitchen. But, overall I am happy with the product and think it is well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A versatile drying rack
reviews.reviewText: This drying rack is rather unique as it’s all silicone and not the conventional plastic. Being so, it is heavier and sturdier. The blue “grass” portion is removable and you can toss the whole thing into the dishwasher which is nice and convenient when you want to thoroughly clean it. You can’t fit as much on it, just a few bottles on the rainbow portion, some pacifiers or bottle nipples on the grass and some toddler utensils in the middle. I do wish it would have drainage though because you do have to empty the water more often than you’d think since it’s just a silicone tray essentially. I appreciate that it’s not such bright coloring so it can match your space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Considering the alternatives, this is the tops from what I've seen. Clearly Doc Browns got some quality goods.At first glance, you may think "Dang, $25 for a drying mat?" but it's totally worth it. Here's why:+ silicone = super easy to clean (dishwasher safe as well 😉)+ removable parts = keep it extra clean and different functional uses+ large area w/ different features = best for drying bottle parts or other small pieces, has brush holders, and the bottle holder actually can double as a soap dispenser slot.This came perfectly sealed, which makes me smile 😃 great work, team!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and helpful
reviews.reviewText: This drying rack is quite different in its design, with the built-in bottle spot and removable insert. It's a lot sturdier than I thought it would be, doesn't flex and act wobbly when you pick it up, it's got substance. The ridges are pronounced enough to work very well and everything is easily cleaned. It doesn't take up a lot of space on the counter but was still slightly bigger than I thought it would be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy way to dry and prep bottles
reviews.reviewText: This Dr. Brown's 2-in-1 mat is a nice way to dry and prep bottles while not taking up much space on your countertop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This drying and prepping mat is very convenient! It doesn’t take lots of counter space, and it’s nice to have everything together. I would recommend this drying mat and Dr. Brown!
